Class HighScoreManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.game.score.HighScoreManager
public final class HighScoreManager extends Object
Manages high score persistence and tracking. Automatically saves and loads high score from disk, and tracks when the current score beats the high score. Uses Observer pattern via JavaFX IntegerProperty for UI binding. Implements Singleton-like behavior through instance management.

  • Property Details

    • highScore

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty highScoreProperty
      Returns the high score property for UI binding.
      See Also:
      • getHighScore()
      • highScoreProperty()

  • Constructor Details

    • HighScoreManager

      public HighScoreManager(Score currentScore)
      Creates a new HighScoreManager. Loads the saved high score from disk and observes the current score to automatically detect when a new high score is achieved.
      Parameters:
      currentScore - the current game score to monitor

  • Method Details

    • highScoreProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty highScoreProperty()
      Returns the high score property for UI binding.
      Returns:
      the IntegerProperty representing the high score
      See Also:
      • getHighScore()

    • getHighScore

      public int getHighScore()
      Gets the current high score value.
      Returns:
      the current high score

    • isNewHighScore

      public boolean isNewHighScore()
      Checks if the current game has achieved a new high score.
      Returns:
      true if a new high score was achieved this game

    • resetNewHighScoreFlag

      public void resetNewHighScoreFlag()
      Resets the new high score flag. Called when starting a new game.

    • saveHighScore

      public void saveHighScore()
      Saves the current high score to disk. Creates the application directory if it doesn't exist. High score is stored in user's home directory under .tetris/highscore.dat

    • onGameEnd

      public void onGameEnd()
      Called when the game ends. Saves the high score if it was beaten.
